page.title: 12AERIAL CROP SPRAYERS.
page.content: Farm supplies (Thirsk) ltd. are situated on the outskirts of Felixkirk. The site covers approximately 12 acres including a landing strip. They have been in business for 12 years. Their business deals with the sale of crop sprays and aerial and ground spraying. To this end they have 2 helicopters for their aerial work, but as they do contract work they frequently use other aircraft. For the ground spraying they have tractors, crop sprayers and three wheel bikes. They employ 12 staff including sales representatives and cover Yorkshire and Durham area.
